description: For a quick and infinitely moreish snack, try these crumbed green olives with a fresh passata sauce and basil!
name: Air-fryer Crumbed Olives Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine flour and paprika in a medium bowl. Place egg and breadcrumbs in 2 separate medium bowls.
Working in batches, toss olive in flour mixture to coat. Dip olives into egg, followed by the crumb, until completely covered.

Preheat the air fryer for 5 minutes at 200Â°C. Place olives on air-fryer tray in a single layer. Spray with olive oil and fry for 8 minutes, shaking the tray slightly at halfway. Cook until olives are golden and crispy.
Meanwhile, bring the passata to a simmer in a small frypan over medium heat, until warmed and slightly reduced.
Place crumbed olives on top of sauce. Sprinkle with parmesan and basil leaves to serve.
